text.title: Indian army helicopter crash kills two in Jammu and Kashmir
text.head: Indian army helicopter crash kills two in Jammu and Kashmir
Sources

list.item: "Pilot and co-pilot killed in Army helicopter crash in Kashmir" — India Today , February 11, 2015
